original_text: Being nice to someone you Dislike doesn’t mean you’re a Fake. It means you’re Mature enough to Tolerate your dislike towards them. 能够善待不太喜欢的人， 并不代表你虚伪， 而意味着你内心成熟到可以容纳这些不喜欢。
